The Revenant maledictus is a superior variant of the revenant.

In order for the maledictus to appear, players must slay revenants inside the Revenant Caves. The chances of a maledictus appearing is factored based on (revenant combat levels / X), where the numerator is the total accumulated combat levels of slain revenants and the denominator is flat spawn rate for the boss. If the boss spawns, the spawn chance is reset. The maledictus has failsafe measures in place that will guarantee a spawn if it has not appeared for a significant amount of time and also prevents additional maledictus from appearing during or after it is killed.

While the maledictus is active, all players in the cavern will be notified of its presence and given a hint as to where it spawned; north, middle, or southern areas of the caves. It will remain in the caves for 10 minutes before despawning if it is not killed by then.

The maledictus can spawn in the following areas:

  • Revenant cyclops/Revenant demon chamber (north)
  • Revenant dragon's chamber (north)
  • Northern revenant imp's area (north)
  • Revenant dark beast's chamber (middle)
  • Revenant hellhound's ruins (middle)
  • Eastern revenant pyrefiend's area (middle)
  • Western revenant pyrefiend's chamber (middle)
  • Northern revenant ork's chamber (middle)
  • Southern revenant ork's chamber (south)
  • Outside the southern revenant demon's area (south)
  • Southern revenant demon's chamber (south)

While the caves themselves are Singles-plus combat, the maledictus can be attacked by all players, who is in turn capable of attacking everyone in range. Utilising the power of the Zarosian emblem on its back, it is also capable of using Ancient Magicks for three special attacks it can use instead of a standard attacks. When the symbol glows blue, it will target all players in range with an ice spell, freezing them in place and preventing them from attacking for a short period. When the symbol glows red, it will target all players in range with a blood spell, dealing damage and healing itself for a portion of the total damage dealt. Both of these attacks can be avoided by stepping off the tile they were on when targeted. Lastly, it can choose a player to launch a large air projectile at, exploding and dealing damage to anyone within a 5x5 AoE, excluding the corners.

Upon death, top-damaging players will receive the Forinthry Surge () skull if they are wearing an amulet of avarice, which provides a 15% accuracy and damage buff in all combat styles against all revenants for 30 minutes. Taking the amulet off will remove the buff, while hopping worlds will reduce its duration by one minute. The buff can also be acquired by killing another player who has it, as long as they also are wearing the amulet. The amulet can be checked to show the time remaining.

The revenant maledictus rolls three drops - one roll for a guaranteed ancient totem or emblem for the top-damaging player, and the remaining two are rolls taken from the revenant dragon's drop table and rates. All players that dealt damage to the boss receive one Blighted Super Restore and two pieces of blighted food, dropped under them. Ironmen players can only obtain drops when killing the boss by themselves.

Drops[edit source]

The following drop rates are provided by Jagex, unless otherwise specified.

All revenants share the same drop list. The higher the revenant's level, the higher the chance they drop an item alongside the guaranteed drops. Wearing an amulet of avarice will cause all drops in the Revenant Caves to be noted.

The average revenant maledictus kill, including its unique drops, is worth 28,608.66 (unskulled) or 33,561.2 (skulled). Excluding the unique drops, the average revenant maledictus kill is worth 27,614 (unskulled) or 31,754 (skulled).

  1. ↑ Revenant ether is only dropped in even quantity amounts

Unique[edit source]

There is a 1 in 8,000 chance of rolling the unique drop table when unskulled and a 1 in 4,400 chance when skulled. When this table is rolled, there is a 2 in 5 chance of receiving an amulet of avarice and a 1 in 5 chance each of receiving a weapon.

  • Its examine text is a reference to The Lord of the Rings.

The '''Revenant maledictus''' is a superior variant of the [[revenant]].

In order for the maledictus to appear, players must slay revenants inside the [[Revenant Caves]]. The chances of a maledictus appearing is factored based on (revenant combat levels / X), where the numerator is the total accumulated [[combat level]]s of slain revenants and the denominator is flat spawn rate for the boss. If the boss spawns, the spawn chance is reset. The maledictus has failsafe measures in place that will guarantee a spawn if it has not appeared for a significant amount of time and also prevents additional maledictus from appearing during or after it is killed. 

While the maledictus is active, all players in the cavern will be notified of its presence and given a hint as to where it spawned; north, middle, or southern areas of the caves. It will remain in the caves for 10 minutes before despawning if it is not killed by then.

The maledictus can spawn in the following areas:
*[[Revenant cyclops]]/[[Revenant demon]] chamber (north)
*[[Revenant dragon]]'s chamber (north)
*Northern [[revenant imp]]'s area (north)
*[[Revenant dark beast]]'s chamber (middle)
*[[Revenant hellhound]]'s ruins (middle)
*Eastern [[revenant pyrefiend]]'s area (middle)
*Western revenant pyrefiend's chamber (middle)
*Northern [[revenant ork]]'s chamber (middle)
*Southern revenant ork's chamber (south)
*Outside the southern revenant demon's area (south)
*Southern revenant demon's chamber (south)

While the caves themselves are [[Singles-plus combat]], the maledictus can be attacked by all players, who is in turn capable of attacking everyone in range. Utilising the power of the [[Zaros]]ian emblem on its back, it is also capable of using [[Ancient Magicks]] for three special attacks it can use instead of a standard attacks. When the symbol glows blue, it will target all players in range with an ice spell, freezing them in place and preventing them from attacking for a short period. When the symbol glows red, it will target all players in range with a blood spell, dealing damage and healing itself for a portion of the total damage dealt. Both of these attacks can be avoided by stepping off the tile they were on when targeted. Lastly, it can choose a player to launch a large air projectile at, exploding and dealing damage to anyone within a 5x5 AoE, excluding the corners.

Upon death, top-damaging players will receive the Forinthry Surge ([[File:Skull (Forinthry surge) icon.png]]) skull if they are wearing an [[amulet of avarice]], which provides a 15% accuracy and damage buff in all combat styles against all [[revenants]] for 30 minutes. Taking the amulet off will remove the buff, while hopping worlds will reduce its duration by one minute. The buff can also be acquired by killing another player who has it, as long as they also are wearing the amulet. The amulet can be checked to show the time remaining.

The revenant maledictus rolls three drops - one roll for a guaranteed [[ancient totem]] or [[ancient emblem|emblem]] for the top-damaging player, and the remaining two are rolls taken from the [[revenant dragon]]'s drop table and rates. All players that dealt damage to the boss receive one Blighted Super Restore and two pieces of blighted food, dropped under them. [[Ironman Mode|Ironmen players]] can only obtain drops when killing the boss by themselves.
